attributes.action: change the way alcohol is sold in supermarkets.why cant we deal with under age drinkers by making all supermarket that sell cheap drinks have a separate shop next to the supermarkets just like australia has. under age drinkers wont get the drink with out proof of age .you dont see under age drinkers on the street like we have. then if supermarket are seen or caught selling alcohol they lose their lience untill they prove there is more security
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
